backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining bond, investment, and user profile types with access-controlled updates and queries including bond date updates and user profile management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing a new Gold Offerings section on the Bonds page with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across layout, routing, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying FUNDGROWTH to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions establishing color tokens and styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup using TanStack Router with all page routes wrapped in a themed AppShell.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Component that restricts access to authenticated users, showing a sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button toggling between sign‑in and sign‑out states using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to complete initial profile setup and submit data.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondCard.t: UI card component displaying key bond details with formatted values and linking to the bond detail page.
frontend/src/components/bonds/BondFilter: UI component providing search, sorting, and risk-tag filtering controls for bond listings.
frontend/src/components/bonds/GoldOfferi: Displays a grid of predefined gold-backed investment offerings with optional premium tags.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedBon: Empty placeholder file for the FeaturedBonds component.
Wraps the main app layout with header, footer, routed content, and a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with navigation links, branding, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Builds the responsive site header with navigation, auth UI, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides auth helpers using Internet Identity, including login, logout, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBonds.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching bond listings and individual bond data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the authenticated user's profile through actor-backed queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, identity persistence, and provider component.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a React Query hook for retrieving the user's portfolio summary from the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and shared utility styles.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency, rates, tenure, dates, rating colors, and risk tag labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/BondDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific bond, including status, ratings, and formatted financial data, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/BondsPage.tsx: Fetches, filters, sorts, and displays a catalog of bond listings with search and risk-tag filtering.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with submission handling and displays platform contact information.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows a user’s investment portfolio summary and active holdings, gated behind authentication.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Displays a list of frequently asked questions using an accordion layout.
frontend/src/pages/GoldSecuredSeriesPage: File is empty and contains no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature list, and promotional investment highlights.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the four investment steps and includes a card detailing benefits of investing with the platform.
frontend/src/pages/InvestPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 page showing a not-found message and a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requests, and state for a bonds page enhancement.
